content: I'm already listening to "How I Built This" and "Stuff You Should Know", so I might try out "Crime Junkie" or "My Favorite Murder" for a change of pace. As for books, I've actually already borrowed "The Power" from the library, but I didn't get a chance to finish it before the lending period expired. I'll have to reborrow it soon. Do you have any recommendations for e-book deals or sales that I might be interested in?
